titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the temporary admission to the United States of the operators of motor common carriers of passengers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/31/1987--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the temporary admission into the United States of operators of (passenger) motor common carriers.
